item.title: Map rendering version 3 missing too many data to display
item.description:
From dientran...@gmail.com on March 28, 2012 09:48:05
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1.I create a map file by mapsforge-map-0.2.4.jar to get map file vesion 2, and a map file by mapsforge-map-0.3.0-SNAPSHOT-jar-with-dependencies.jar library to get map file vesion 3. 2.When display on androidphone, ,compared to map file vesion 2, map file vesion 3 is display very few data, many way is missing... (My area is "giai phong, ha noi, Viet Nam") Please provide any additional information below. Thanks advanced!
Attachment: Map screenshot-version2.jpeg
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=280

item.contents:
From thilo.mu...@gmail.com on April 22, 2012 02:55:28
Closing this issue as the reporter did not provide the requested information.
Status: Invalid
